title: Died Before the Wedding - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural   Tragedy   Yaoi
tags: Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Dead Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Doting Love Interests   Family   First-time Interc**rse   Friendship   Ghosts   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Marriage   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Persistent Love Interests   Pets   Popular Love Interests   Suicides   Younger Love Interests
author: Have Wine   有酒
description:
I thought that if I walk with you, it would be for a lifetime. But I don’t know how far the end of a lifetime really is.

I thought it was at least far enough to share until we are both old. But I died before the wedding.>
